Name: Project Must Have Budget
Description: Each project must have a defined budget

Name: Team Must Have Scrum Master
Description: Each team must be supported by one Scrum Master

Name: Product Owner Must Manage Backlog
Description: Every product backlog must be managed by a product owner

Name: Features Must Be in Backlog
Description: All features should be part of a product backlog

Name: User Stories Should Belong to Epics
Task Must Belong to User Story
Description: All tasks must trace back to a user story

Name: Developers Must Have Skills
Description: Only assign workers with matching skills to tasks

Name: Stakeholders Should Attend Review
Description: Involve stakeholders in sprint review sessions

Name: Sprints Must Pursue Goals
Description: Each sprint must be tied to a sprint goal

Name: Task Cannot Be Blocked
Description: Tasks should ideally not have active blockers
